A game where you get that nostalgic feeling when you were young, with your friends playing inside a computer cafe.
in this game you either die a hero or play for long enough to see yourself become the villain. community is more toxic than a kilo of anthrax, 11/10

Usually this game is quite fun with friends, note how i said WITH FRIENDS.
This game is damn near impossible to play by solo queueing in mm because of all the randoms messing about.
No chance you can take this seriously without atleast 1-2 friends playing with you, but overall the game is quite good, you can have good moments in mm even with randoms but it's minimal.
I recommend playing this game if you have enought time/friends to play with.
